info.title: incadea APIs - Sales Package
info.description: Encloses APIs related to the sale business process.

parameters.name: LeadId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the lead.

204.description: The lead has been updated successfully

400.description:
The client error, which can have the following Error Codes: 
*   101 Invalid request parameters

500.description:
The server error, which can have the following Error Codes: 
*  110 Backend service is not found or unavailable. 
*  111 Backend platform unexpected error
*  112 No endpoint found with the requested URL
*  113 Invalid SOAP action name configured
*  114 Unexpected error

201.description: The custmer has been created successfully

post.summary: Create a reservation for a vehicle

delete.summary: Delete the reservation for the vehicle

parameters.name: VehicleId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the vehicle.

parameters.name: ReservationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the reservation to be deleted.

204.description: The reservation of the vehicle has been successfully released.

Id.description: An unique identifier of the lead

LeadSource.description: The information related to the origin of the lead

ExtenalId.description: An unique identifier of the lead in the external system, the lead entity came from, e.g. OEM

SourceType.description: The type of the source from where the lead has been generated

CampaignId.description: An unique identifier of the campaign in case the lead origin is a campaign

ChannelType.description: A channel which leaded to the lead generation

Description.description: An additional description of the lead source

Reason.description: The reason, why the lead has contacted and what he is looking for

LeadTarget.description: The information related to the destination system, where the lead data are sent.

DealerId.description: The unique identifier of the dealer, where the lead targets to

PreferredSalesPersonId.description: The Id of the preferred sales person for this lead

CreatedOn.description: The date when the leas has been created

DueDate.description: By when this inquery needs to be processed

Description.description: An aditional description of the lead
Description.example: Wants to arrange a test-drive for a new model

Id.description: The unique identifier of the contact

CustomerId.description: The unique identifier of the Customer, if the contact person is already known by the backend system

FirstName.description: The first name of the contact person

LastName.description: The last name of the contact person

CompanyName.description: The name of the company, where the contact person belongs to

CommunicationOptions.description: A list of the possible options/channels to communicate with the customer.

LeadInterests.description: A list of the vehicle descriptions, in which the lead is interested.

IsMainInterest.description: Indicates the main interest in case several interests are provided as part of the same lead

Make.description: The make of the vehicle of the interest

Code.description: The code of the vehicle category

Description.description: The description of the vehicle category

Model.description: The mode of the vehicle of the interest

VehicleType.description: Type of the vehicle: new or used

DataPrivacyConsent.description: A list of the consents related to the data privacy

MasterData.description: Containing master data for the sales area

LeadStatuses.description: A list of the lead statuses

Models.description: A list of the vehicle models

VehicleCategories.description: A list of the vehicle categories

Colors.description: A list of the vehicle exterior colors

EngineTypes.description: A list of the engine types

LeadUpdate.description: Containing the information to update a lead

Description.description: Additional information related to the lead update

Id.description: A unique identifier of the customer

InternalId.description: A unique identifier of the customer in the incadea.dms/incadea.fastfit

ExternalId.description: A unique identifier of the customer in some external system, e.g. OEM

AcademicTitle.description: Form of addressing the customer, indicating respect

FirstName.description: The first name of the private customer

MiddleName.description: The middle name of the private customer

LastName.description: The last name of the private customer

CompanyName.description: The name of the company of the business customer

BirthPlace.description: Place, where the customer was born. Used for some customer identification de-duplication processes

PreferredLanguageCode.description: The language code of the preferred language

Phones.description: A list of the phone numbers

CommunicationOptions.description: A list of the possible options/channels to communicate with the customer.

DataPrivacyConsent.description: A list of the consents related to the data privacy

VehicleSearchParameters.description: The parameters for the vehicle search

ColorCodes.description: A list of the color codes

EngineTypeCodes.description: A list of the color codes

EnginePowerFrom.description: A minimum value of the engine power

EnginePowerTo.description: A maximum value of the engine power

VehicleType.description: Type of the vehicle: new or used

VIN.description: An unique identifier of the Vehicle

VehicleSummary.description: A minimum information about the vehicle returned by search

Id.description: An unique identifier of the Vehicle

VIN.description: An unique identifier of the Vehicle

VIN2.description: An additional identifier of the vehicle, e.g. fabrication code

VehicleType.description: Type of the vehicle: new or used

ColorCode.description: The exterior code of the color

ColorDescription.description: The human readable description of the exterior color code

InteriorColorDescription.description: The human readable description of the interior color code

ReservationId.description: An unique identifier of the reservation of this vehicle

CustomerVehicleDetails.description: A detailed information about the customer vehicle

LicenseNo.description: The license number of the Vehicle

LicensePlateIssueCountryCode.description: The code of the country, which issued the license plate

LastVisitDate.description: The date of the last visit date

ServiceContracts.description: A collection of the service contacts and packages related to this vehicle

Customers.description: A collection of the customers related to this vehicle

VehicleRelationshipType.description: The type of the relation between a vehicle and a customer

RelationshipType.description: A type of the relation towards a vehicle

CustomerId.description: An unique identifier of the customer

CustomerName.description: The name of the customer (personal or business entity)

Type.description: A type of the service contract

Code.description: A code of the contract or package if applicable

Description.description: Descritpion or name of the contract or package

StartDate.description: Beginning date of the contract validity

EndDate.description: The last day of the contract validity

VehicleReservation.description: Containing the information about the vehicle reservation

ValidTo.description: Indicates till when the reservation is valid

ReservedBy.description: A name of the sales person, who reserved this vehicle

Mileage.description: Containing the information about the vehicle reservation

UpdatedOn.description: Date of the last mileage update

EngineType.description: Engine type as an abstract description

EngineCode.description: The two- or three-digit engine code

EnginePowerUnit.description: The engine power unit of measure

TransmissionCode.description: The two- or three-digit transmission code

Equipment.description: A list of the additional equipment which can impact on the vehicle price and aftersales activities

AvailabilityStatus.description: The status of the vehicle for sales
